# <mono>_quarto.yml</mono> config file

.pull-left4[

Global information for the website configuration.
<ul>
  <li class="m1"><span><mono>navbar</mono> sets location and content of navigation</span></li> 
  <li class="m2"><span><mono>theme, css</mono> define layout</span></li> 
    <li class="m3"><span><mono>toc</mono> adds table of contents</span></li>

</ul>

]

.pull-right5[

<div style="width:70%">
````markdown

project:
  type: website

website:
  title: "today"
  navbar:
    left:
      - href: index.qmd
        text: Home
      - about.qmd

format:
  html:
    theme: cosmo
    css: styles.css
    toc: true
    
````
</div>
<iframe class="slide-deck" src="" width = "70%" ></iframe>

]
